Class OntologyTreeListener

  • java.lang.Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    public class OntologyTreeListener
extends MouseAdapter
    Description: This class listens events on tree selection
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Niraj Aswani

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected int[] annotationRange
      This is where we specify the start/end offsets of the highlighted annotations which is then used for quick lookup to see if the mouse is on one of them

      List of highlighted annotations
